Name: Zombie Crisis: Last One Standing
About the game: Zombie Crisis: Last One Standing is a LAN(local area network) Battle Royale genre game. Features: 1, Battle Royale After the game enters the Battle Royale level map, the player has nothing at first, need to find and collect weapons and ammunition and medical kits, and also need to avoid exposure to the safe area of continuous contraction, and the player who survives to the end will win. 2, Medium size map Medium-sized map, the game has a moderate rhythm. 3, LAN connection In the LAN environment, you can play with friends at any time.
